name: Wrath of Anubis
description: A wave-based zombie survival shooter heavily inspired by the Call of Duty Zombies games and Karlson (by Dani). Shred the undead with 5 unique weapons in a beautifully created desert outpost. A second prototype map is also included in the game, which was the first map created for the game and where most of the game was developed in. The goal of this addicting shooter is to reach the highest round possible before you die. Your best scores will be saved for you to try and beat!
